StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetStandardofE.ec.venessForRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @NewRSS bit AS
--- use decimals for # interviews rather than integers DECLARE @TC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @AC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @OT_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @HV_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @DC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2)
--- if the RSS has been open at least 3 months (@NewRSS = 0) then get its business percentage data IF @NewRSS = 0 BEGIN
SET @TC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(TC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @AC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(AC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @OT_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(OT_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @HV_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(HV_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @DC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(DC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SELECT TCvalue = CASE WHEN @TC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.TCS))/@TC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, OTvalue = CASE WHEN @OT_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.OTS))/@OT_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, ACvalue = CASE WHEN @AC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.ACS))/@AC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, HVvalue = CASE WHEN @HV_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.HVS))/ @HV_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, DCvalue = CASE WHEN @DC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.DCS))/@DC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate)
END ELSE /* if the RSS has been open less than 3 months (@NewRSS = 1) then get the average standard of e.ect data for all the RSSs under the RS */ BEGIN
SET @TC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @AC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(AC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @OT_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(OT_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @HV_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(HV_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @DC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(RA.DC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SELECT TCvalue = CASE WHEN @TC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.TCS))/ @TC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, OTvalue = CASE WHEN @OT_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.OTS))/@OT_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, ACvalue = CASE WHEN @AC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.ACS))/@AC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, HVvalue = CASE WHEN @HV_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.HVS))/ @HV_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, DCvalue = CASE WHEN @DC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(CONVERT(DECIMAL, SUM(RA.DCS))/ @DC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID) AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate) END
